item.title: Dinner With Photo Matt
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Last nights SacStarts dinner had a few new faces, including Matt Mullenweg (aka Photo Matt). Although we’ve exchanged some email and chatted a bit, this was the first time I met Matt face to face. It was a fun time, Matt is a nice guy and very cool about driving from the bay area to […]
item.content:encoded:
Last nights SacStarts dinner had a few new faces, including Matt Mullenweg (aka Photo Matt). Although we’ve exchanged some email and chatted a bit, this was the first time I met Matt face to face.

It was a fun time, Matt is a nice guy and very cool about driving from the bay area to Sacramento.

Adam has a few pictures up, but please, find it in your heart to ignore this one.

item.title: SacStarts.com
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: At the beginning of January Adam Kalsey launched SacStarts.com. The site grew out of Adam and Scott Hildebrand looking for tech get togethers in the Sacramento/Davis area. Now there are informal monthly dinners for tech heads and entrepreneurs to get together and chat. The February dinner in on the 22nd, 7pm at Hoppy Brewing Company […]
item.content:encoded:
At the beginning of January Adam Kalsey launched SacStarts.com. The site grew out of Adam and Scott Hildebrand looking for tech get togethers in the Sacramento/Davis area.

Now there are informal monthly dinners for tech heads and entrepreneurs to get together and chat. The February dinner in on the 22nd, 7pm at Hoppy Brewing Company on Folsom Blvd. If you are in the area signup, the only cost is for your own dinner.

I’ve been to many of the dinners they’ve had so far and the conversation has always been interesting and informative.

In June there are plans for a BarCamp Sacramento.
